channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Parents Of Charlie Kirk’s Assassin Faced Darkness But Chose Justice
item.description: What this family confronted deserves to be noticed, praised, and modeled. Our country was given clarity in real time.

item.title: Democrats Are Holding The Government Hostage To Get Taxpayer-Funded Health Care For Illegals
item.description: 'It’s just proof that they do not even know what is in their own bill that they shut down the government over,' Minarik said.

item.title: Leaders in Middle East hail Trump for Israel-Hamas peace deal as Nobel Peace Prize talk grows
item.description: Leaders across the Middle East on Thursday praised President Trump for his efforts to implement the first phase of his peace plan in Gaza.

item.title: You’re 10 times more likely to have a flight delay during the government shutdown, Transportation Secretary says: ‘These controllers are stressed out’
item.description: Historically, 5% of delays can be attributed to air traffic controller staffing issues. This week, it’s been 53%, Sean Duffy said.

item.title: To Fix the Deficit, Start with Bloated ‘Disability’ Programs
item.description: Cutting spending is always hard, so conservatives should focus on the least deserving recipients no matter what walk of life they are in.

item.title: White House brutally mocks Kamala Harris' 'cackle' after former VP drops F-bomb, suggests admin is 'crazy'
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris uses profanity to suggest the Trump administration was "crazy" during Los Angeles event where she promoted her new...

item.title: Roughly half of US states are effectively in a recession and ‘hanging on by their fingertips,’ Moody’s chief economist says
item.description: Moody’s chief economist Mark Zandi tells Fortune parts of America are already in recession, with 22 states contracting despite strong national GDP gro...

item.title: Trump Should Use His Tariff Instincts to Lower Drug Prices
item.description: The president has an opportunity to pressure foreign leaders into delivering a fair prescription drug market for Americans.

item.title: Gen Z credit scores are having a ‘catastrophic drop’—student loans and doomspending may be to blame
item.description: Student loan payments, inflation, and social-media-fueled spending are crushing Gen Z’s credit scores—and it could haunt them for decades.

item.title: Federal judge limits ICE arrests without warrant, probable cause
item.description: A federal judge extended a consent decree limiting ICE's warrantless arrests until 2026 after finding agents violated constitutional protections.

item.title: Israel and Hamas agree to 'first phase' of plan to end fighting and release hostages, Trump says
item.description: Israel and Hamas have agreed to the "first phase" of his peace plan to pause fighting and release at least some hostages and prisoners, U.S. President...

item.title: Stripe exec says she’s hiring new grads more than ever but she’s ‘sweating’ about the Gen Z talent pipeline—and warns the era of skills is at risk

item.title: Two Republicans vote with Dems as Senate GOP spikes bid to block Trump's strikes on drug-smuggling boats

item.title: Lawsuit: The Dead Still Live On Michigan’s Dirty Voter Rolls
item.description: The Public Interest Legal Foundation wants the Supreme Court to clarify what a 'reasonable effort' means in voter list maintenance.

item.title: The Humiliating Failure of Washington State’s Plastic Bag Ban
item.description: Lawmakers favored political posturing rather than data.

item.title: The Trump-brokered Gaza truce includes a U.S.-led reconstruction plan and Arab-led security in Gaza
item.description: Five border crossings will reopen, including the Rafah crossing between Gaza and Egypt.

item.title: The Atlantic Fantasizes About Military Treason Against Trump
item.description: These are not idle musings. It is dangerous to encourage trained and weaponized warfighters to turn on the commander and chief.

item.title: Colorado Is Still as Confused on Free Speech as It Is on Gender
item.description: The Supreme Court appears skeptical of laws restricting therapists from counseling against gender transitions.

item.title: Sherrill, Ciattarelli clash over Trump, transparency, affordability in final New Jersey debate
item.description: The final debate in the race for New Jersey's governorship revealed starkly opposing views on President Trump's first year in office.

item.title: Jay Jones And Katie Porter Say The Quiet Part Out Loud
item.description: They don't believe you can be reasoned or compromised with, and they're telling you in writing and on camera that they're not interested in trying.
